title: Descriptions: Objects (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the Objects subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: The largest ship I had ever seen was arriving at the port.
cards.romaji: Mita koto mo nai yona okisa no fune ga minato ni tochaku shita.
cards.japanese: 見たこともないような大きさの船が港に到着した。
